analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas la //

analyzed: bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni ded dpon tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs ni byin pa yi //
translated: (The Sugata) Ghoṣadatta first generated the mind of enlightenment when he was a farmer🔽and offered a lump of ice

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar bzod de la //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog chen po pa // de la khab dag dbul ba byas nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: (The Sugata) Jñānavāri first generated the mind of enlightenment when he was a prince🔽and offered a parasol of gold🔽to the Tathāgata known as Joy of the World.

original: bde gshegs 'od zer sna tshogs sha na mkhan gyi tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs 'od zer sna tshogs sha na mkhan gyi tshe //
translated: The Sugata Citra-raśmi first generated the mind of enlightenment when he was a weaver🔽and offered a canopy of cloth to the Sugata known as Joyful Mind.🔽

translated: The Sugata Citrakiraṇa first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a weaver and offered a robe m ade of cotton to the Tathàgata known as Meditation.

original: khye'u tshe de bzhin gshags pa blo gsal la //🔽la du dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs padma'i snying po rtsis pa yis //

translated: The Sugata Jñànavîra first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a young boy in a city and offered a ladle of rice to the Tathàgata known as Clear Mind.

original: khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas blo la //🔽me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs me tog rgyas pa lag bla'i tshe //
analyzed: khye'u tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mkhas blo la // me tog snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs me tog rgyas pa lag bla'i tshe //
translated: The Sugata Padmagarbha first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a young boy and tossed a handful of flowers to the Tathàgata known as Mind of Skill.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nor sbyin de la ni //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nor sbyin de la ni //
translated: The Sugata Pûrnôtpala first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent as a young boy who offered a handful of flowers to the Tathàgata known as Gift of Wealth.

original: dus ma yin par bcud ldan btud ba phul //
analyzed: dus ma yin par bcud ldan btud ba phul //
translated: The Sugata Vikasitakusum a first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent as a water-carrier who offered timely, nutritious food to the Tathàgata known as Gift of Wealth.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs mthu rtsal stobs ni ral pa can //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs mthu rtsal stobs ni ral pa can //
translated: generated the mind of enlightenment for the first time.🔽The Sugata Vikramakīrti first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a brahman and offered a seat

original: sbyin sreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po //
analyzed: sbyin sreg mkhan tshe de bzhin gshegs pa po //

analyzed: zhum med dbyangs la zhugs 'di phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: bde gshegs bsod nams phung po tshong pa'i tshe //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la //🔽lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs de la // lhung bzed sbrang rtsis bkang ste phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: bde gshegs gzugs mchog grong khyer srung ba'i tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs gzi brjid phul po rtsva thun tshe //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zab mor gnas de la //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

translated: The Sugata Aksayamuni first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a chariot-maker and offered a seat for the Tathàgata known as Difficult to Subdue.

analyzed: bde gshegs mngon rtogs can ni sman pa'i tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs yul 'khor shes rab mar tshong tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs shes rab byin ni mar tshong tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs rdza mkhan tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs shin tu thugs gzhungs mi bkren tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi me tog la //

analyzed: thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: and, with palms together, bowed to the Tathagata known as Flower of Dharma.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa don dgongs gti mug bral //
translated: The Tathagata Arthabuddhinihsrita first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a prince🔽and offered a canopy of pearls to the Tathagata known as Mind of the Moon.

original: 'khor los bsgyur tshe bde gshegs dpal chen la; ;grong khyer dpag tshad bcu pa phul nas kyang //
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur tshe bde gshegs dpal chen la; ;grong khyer dpag tshad bcu pa phul nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: This was when he first gave rise to bodhichitta.

original: bde gshegs dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad par 'phags //🔽shing srung tshe na bde gshegs 'od byed la //🔽pha gu'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs mchog tu mdzes gshegs rtsis pa yi //

original: bran mo'i tshe na bde gshegs me 'od la //🔽me tog kar ni ka ras gtor nas kyang //
analyzed: bran mo'i tshe na bde gshegs me 'od la // me tog kar ni ka ras gtor nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs zhi don rgyal po'i pho nya tshe //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa blta na sdug pa la //🔽lan grangs brgya snyed bskor ba byas nas kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa blta na sdug pa la // lan grangs brgya snyed bskor ba byas nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: bde gshegs khengs med bca' pa mkhan gyi tshe //

translated: The Sugata Asammata first generated the m ind of enlighten­ m ent w hen he was a m aster builder and offered a temple to the Tathagata known as God of the Gods.🔽The Sugata Simhabala first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a brahm in and offered palm fruit to the Tathagata known as Strength of Wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab stobs de la //🔽aa mra'i 'bras bu dag ni phul nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs dbang bsgyur rgyal po khyim bdag gi /

translated: The Sugata Hastivaktra first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a brahm in and offered a mango to the Tathagata known as Strength of Awareness.

original: bu tshe bde gshegs kun tu gzigs de la //🔽sle tres lo ma dag gis gtor nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs bdud rtsi gsal ba tshong mkhan tshe //

translated: The Sugata V asavindraraja first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was the son of a great householder and tossed citron leaves to the Sugata known as Vision of All.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la //🔽gser snam dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pas mchod de la //🔽gser snam dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: The Sugata Amrtaprakasa first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a m erchant and offered a golden cloth to the Tathagata known as Worshiped by Brahma.

original: bde gshegs bsam gtan @524b snyoms pa shing srung tshe //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thub pa'i me tog la //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i blo de la //🔽nor bu rin chen glegs ma phul nas kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i blo de la // nor bu rin chen glegs ma phul nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs dri mar bzhi phyug po yi //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs dri mar bzhi phyug po yi //

translated: The Sugata Gandhahastin first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was the son of a great m erchant and offered a m anip pearl to the Tathagata known as Overcom er of Waves.

analyzed: bu tshe bde gshegs shes rab rdzogs pa la //🔽mar 'khur dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: The Sugata Digvilom a first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent as the son of a householder, w hen offering a load of butter to the Sugata known as Complete Wisdom.

analyzed: de bzhin @525b gshegs pa gsan pa'i blo ldan la //

analyzed: tshva yi ro bcu dag ni dbul nas kyang //

analyzed: bde gshegs sgra gcan nyi ma'i snying po phye tshong tshe //

analyzed: rtsa ltan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs snang gzigs rtsis pa'i khye'u'i tshe; ;de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sems de la //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs snang gzigs rtsis pa'i khye'u'i tshe; ;de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan sems de la //

original: rin chen dra ba dag ni phul nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: rin chen dra ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: when he was a mathematician and offered a jeweled net🔽to the Tathāgata known as Mind of Virtue.

original: bde gshegs legs spyad rnam smin bca' ba mkhan //🔽byed tshe bde gshegs sprin gyi dbyangs de la //
analyzed: bde gshegs legs spyad rnam smin bca' ba mkhan // byed tshe bde gshegs sprin gyi dbyangs de la //
translated: The Sugata Su­carita­vipāka first gave rise to bodhicitta🔽when he was a cook

original: lhung bzed bca' bas bkang ste phul nas kyang //
analyzed: lhung bzed bca' bas bkang ste phul nas kyang //
translated: and offered a begging bowl full of food to the Sugata known as Melody of the Clouds.🔽The Sugata Su­priya first gave rise to bodhicitta🔽when he was a hero and offered a garment

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do; ;bde gshegs legs par dgyes pa dpa' bo'i cha //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba'i dbyangs de la // rgyal mtshan dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang @533a *// por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: to the Tathagata known as Clear Melody.

analyzed: bde gshegs mya ngan bral ba rtsis pa'i tshe //
translated: ( 10) The Sugata Vigatatamas first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a tradesm an and offered a garland of flowers

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song spong ba la // me tog rna rgyal dag ni phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: bde gshegs rin chen 'od ni dge slong bsnyen bkur ba //
translated: ( 11) The Sugata Ratnaprabha first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a monk and offered a lamp

analyzed: byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi me tog la // mar me dag ni rab tu dbul ba byas nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por nyid du byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: ( 12) The Tathagata Ciiridatta first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a householder and took up the five precepts

original: de bzhin gshegs pa spyod ldan khyim bdag tshe //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa spyod ldan khyim bdag tshe //
translated: of moral practice in the presence of the Tathagata known as Beautiful Eyes.🔽( 13) The Tathagata Ciiriicarya first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a householder

analyzed: bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dag ni gzung nas kyang //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzas ldan pa la //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: in the presence of the Tathagata known as Endowed w ith Beautiful Eyes.

analyzed: bde gshegs bsod nams stobs ni khyim bdag tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la //
translated: The Sugata Puṇya­bala first generated the mind of enlightenment when he was a householder

analyzed: mal stan shing bal can ni phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho shing rta mkhan //
analyzed: bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho shing rta mkhan //
translated: The Sugata Gunasagara first generated the mind of enlightenment when he was a cartwright

analyzed: byed tshe bde gshegs brtul zhugs chen po di'i // gnas khang dag ni byug pas byugs nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: bde gshegs rmad byung snang ma pa yi tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa brtan de la //
translated: The Sugata Atyadbhuta first generated the mind of enlightenment when he was a gardener

analyzed: snang ma dag ni bltam @533b ste phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: bde gshegs ngan spong rgyal po'i btsun mo'i tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa myos pa spong ba la //
translated: The Sugata Kṣemaṅkara first generated the mind of enlightenment when he was a king’s queen

original: me tog lda ldi dag ni phul nas kyang //
analyzed: me tog lda ldi dag ni phul nas kyang //
translated: and offered a garland of flowers to the Tathagata known as Abandoning Intoxication.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: he first gave rise to the mind of awakening.🔽The Sugata Māradhvaṃsī first gave rise to bodhicitta

original: bde gshegs bdud brlag mdzad pa dmag mi'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs bdud brlag mdzad pa dmag mi'i tshe //
translated: when he was a soldier🔽and offered sandals

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi me tog la //🔽mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gyi me tog la // mchil lham dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs bag chags rgal stabs tshong pa'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs bag chags rgal stabs tshong pa'i tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs bsam gyis mi khyab 'ong de la; ;phreng ba dag las byes pa'i bla bre phul // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs mi byed blo mnga' bshan pa'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs mi byed blo mnga' bshan pa'i tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od de la; ;shir sha'i phreng ba dag ni phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho drang po'i tshe //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho drang po'i tshe //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de yi //
translated: to the Tathāgata known as Light of the Moon.

original: spyan sngar glu dbyangs dag ni dbyangs nas kyang //
analyzed: spyan sngar glu dbyangs dag ni dbyangs nas kyang //
translated: and sang this song in the presence of the Sugata known as Joy of the Moon.🔽He first gave rise to bodhichitta.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dag mdzad grong dpon tshe //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // de bzhin gshegs pa dag mdzad grong dpon tshe //
translated: The Tathagata Sunetra first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a town chief, he offered golden flowers🔽to the Tathagata known as Moon of the Mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'od zla ba la; ;gser gyi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yid 'od zla ba la; ;gser gyi me tog dag ni phul nas kyang //
translated: (1) The Sugata Gaṇendra first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a merchant, he offered food🔽to the Tathagata known as Melody of Beauty.🔽(2) The Sugata Priyaprabha first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a lotus farmer, he offered karnikara flowers🔽to the Tathagata known as Supreme Mind.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: (3) The Sugata Bodhidhvaja first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a town chief, he offered a parasol of gold🔽to the Tathagata known as Joy of the Moon.🔽(4) The Sugata Sunetra first gave rise to bodhichitta

original: bde gshegs tshogs can grol rgyal tshong pa'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs tshogs can grol rgyal tshong pa'i tshe //
translated: When, as a town chief, he offered golden flowers

original: de bzhin @534a *//
analyzed: de bzhin @534a *//
translated: to the Tathagata known as Moon of the Mind.🔽(5) The Sugata Gaṇendra first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a merchant, he offered food🔽to the Tathagata known as Melody of Beauty.

original: gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs de la //
analyzed: gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs de la //
translated: (6) The Sugata Priyaprabha first gave rise to bodhichitta

original: kha zas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //
analyzed: kha zas dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //
translated: When, as a lotus farmer, he offered karnikara flowers🔽to the Tathagata known as Supreme Mind.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: (7) The Sugata Bodhidhvaja first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a town chief, he offered a parasol of gold🔽to the Tathagata known as Joy of the Moon.

original: bde gshegs dga' 'od padma mkhan gyi tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs dga' 'od padma mkhan gyi tshe //
translated: (8) The Sugata Sunetra first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a town chief, he offered golden flowers🔽to the Tathagata known as Moon of the Mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros mchog de la //
translated: (9) The Sugata Gaṇendra first gave rise to bodhichitta🔽When, as a merchant, he offered food🔽to the Tathagata known as Melody of Beauty.🔽(10) The Sugata Priyaprabha first gave rise to bodhichitta

original: ka rant ka dag ni phul nas kyang //
analyzed: ka rant ka dag ni phul nas kyang //
translated: When, as a lotus farmer, he offered karnikara flowers🔽to the Tathagata known as Supreme Mind.

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do; ;bde gshegs byang chub rgyal mtshan mdun 'don tshe //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do; ;bde gshegs byang chub rgyal mtshan mdun 'don tshe //
translated: (11) The Sugata Bodhidhvaja first gave rise to bod

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od de la //
translated: The Tathagata Candrakalpa first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a weaver

original: chos la dgab pa'i na bza' phul nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: chos la dgab pa'i na bza' phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs ye shes rin chen phreng rgyud tshe //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po la //
analyzed: bde gshegs ye shes rin chen phreng rgyud tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snying po la //

analyzed: me tog dag las byas pa'i rgyal mtshan phul // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs shin tu bsil ba khyim bdag gi /

analyzed: bu tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yid gtong la //

analyzed: nor bu rin chen mchil lham phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs rgyal ded dpon tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sbyin byin pa la //

analyzed: bde gshegs ye shes dgyes pa shing rta mkhan //

original: byed @534b tshe bde gshegs yid bzhin 'byor ba la //🔽bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul ba byas na kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: byed @534b tshe bde gshegs yid bzhin 'byor ba la // bzhugs khri'u dag ni dbul ba byas na kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul tog ni gar mkhan tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs rdzu 'phrul tog ni gar mkhan tshe //
translated: The Sugata Rddhiketu first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a dancer and,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa dgyes de yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thar pa dgyes de yi //
translated: in the presence of the Tathagata known as Joy of Liberation,

original: spyan sngar bro gar dag ni byas nas so kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa tshong dpon gyi /🔽bu tshe dad pas bde gshegs stabs 'jog la //
analyzed: spyan sngar bro gar dag ni byas nas so kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs skye dbang mtshungs pa tshong dpon gyi / bu tshe dad pas bde gshegs stabs 'jog la //

analyzed: gser skud dag gis gtong ba byas nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: The Sugata Jativaśa first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was the son of a great m erchant and, w ith faith, offered a golden thread to the Sugata known as Manner of Walking.

original: bde gshegs sa yi dbang phyug rngon pa'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs sa yi dbang phyug rngon pa'i tshe //
translated: The Sugata Ksetrapala first generated the m ind of enlightenm ent w hen he was a hunter and offered sandals m ade of grass

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra dag 'dul pa la //🔽rtsva las byas pa'i mchil lham phul nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
translated: was when he was a flower garland maker🔽and offered a garland of utpala flowers🔽to the Sugata known as Joy of the Sun.

analyzed: bde gshegs nyi ma dgyes pa phye ma mkhan // byed che bde gshegs yul med spong ba la //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs skrag can zla ba gzhan bran tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs skrag can zla ba gzhan bran tshe //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od de la //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od de la //

analyzed: rtsva yi khang bzang byas te phul nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs me tog 'od ni dge slong tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs me tog 'od ni dge slong tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ngar mi sems pa la // mchil snod dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do /

analyzed: @535a *// bde gshegs sman pa'i bdag po bram ze'i tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag sgra sgrog la //🔽bee d'urya las byas pa'i gdugs phul nas //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mdangs mnga' bzang mkhan tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa dpag med spyan di ya //

analyzed: na bza' dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs bsod nams dgyes pa bram ze'i tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs bsod nams dgyes pa bram ze'i tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs dpa' bo la // me tog zad mi shes pas gtor nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // de bzhin gshegs pa dga' stobs rnga mkhan tshe // de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'bar de la ni //

analyzed: rnga bo che dag brdung ba byas nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan phyug po'i tshe //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs snyan phyug po'i tshe //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs de la //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan tshogs de la //
translated: to the Tathāgata known as Accumulation of Virtue.

original: gling bu dag ni 'bud pa byas nas kyang //
analyzed: gling bu dag ni 'bud pa byas nas kyang //

original: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: bde gshegs skye dbang rgyal po tshong dpon tshe //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gnas de la // kun dga' rab dag ni phul nas kyang //

analyzed: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

original: bde gshegs sgra gcan sbed pa shing srung tshe //
analyzed: bde gshegs sgra gcan sbed pa shing srung tshe //
translated: To the Sugata known as Joy of the Sun.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus cher dgongs la //🔽sge'u gsher dag gi dum bu phul nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dge mdzad chu chun tshe //

translated: The Tathagata Mahavirya first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a merchant and offered a piece of sugarcane to the Tathagata known as Great Effort.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od ni 'bar ba la // @540a *// chu grang dag ni dbul ba byas nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs sengge'i blo gros khyim bdag tshe //
translated: The Sugata Supriya first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a water-carrier and offered cold water to the Tathagata known as Blazing Light.🔽The Sugata Punyavrata first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a water-carrier and offered cold water to the Tathagata known as Light of the World.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal sdud pa la //🔽me tog blta na sdug ba phul nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //🔽bde gshegs rin chen grags pa shing srung tshe //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthu rtsal sdud pa la // me tog blta na sdug ba phul nas kyang // dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do // bde gshegs rin chen grags pa shing srung tshe //
translated: The Sugata Simhamati first generated the true mind of enlightenment when he was a householder and offered beautiful flowers to the Tathagata known as Strength of Gathering.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa zab bsgoms la //🔽sgra dbyangs dag gi mchod pa phul nas kyang //🔽dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa don mdzad phyug pa'i tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs srid pa'i me tog khrus pa'i tshe //

analyzed: bde gshegs mdzod spu ldan pa drang srong tshe //

analyzed: byed tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bkod pa po //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa brtul zhugs sengge'i de yi ni //

original: 'khor tshe de yi 'bras bu de 'dra na //
analyzed: 'khor tshe de yi 'bras bu de 'dra na //
translated: If the results are like this even in cyclic existence,

original: mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems mi bskyed //
analyzed: mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems mi bskyed //
translated: What wise person would not arouse the awakening mind?🔽It is difficult to measure the extent of space

original: nam mkha' dag gi tshad dag bzung ba dang // rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis bgrang nas kyi //🔽sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shas tsam gyi //
analyzed: nam mkha' dag gi tshad dag bzung ba dang // rgya mtsho chen po mthar gyis bgrang nas kyi // sangs rgyas dag la dad pa shas tsam gyi //
translated: And the great ocean is beyond counting,🔽But the merit of a mere fraction of faith in the buddhas

original: bsod nams tshad bzung bar ni nus par dka'//
analyzed: bsod nams tshad bzung bar ni nus par dka'//
translated: Is difficult to measure.

original: ji srid mya ngan 'das bde ma reg par //
analyzed: ji srid mya ngan 'das bde ma reg par //
translated: Until you reach the bliss of nirvana,

original: de srid mi khom sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de srid mi khom sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur //
translated: You will not experience the suffering of the inopportune states.

original: @542b de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thob nas //
analyzed: @542b de bas rgyal ba bsod nams zhing thob nas //
translated: Therefore, having attained the field of merit of the victors,

original: bag yod mi yis bkur sti mchod pa gyis //
analyzed: bag yod mi yis bkur sti mchod pa gyis //

original: sangs rgyas dag la lhag par mos pa'i tshe //🔽bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dag la lhag par mos pa'i tshe // bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung la //
translated: When you have superior interest in the buddhas,🔽Even the smallest offering made to the relics of the blissful ones

original: mchod pa chung shas byed pa'i yon tan mtha'//
analyzed: mchod pa chung shas byed pa'i yon tan mtha'//
translated: Who have entered nirvana will have boundless good qualities.

original: bsam par nus ma yin na de lta zhog /
analyzed: bsam par nus ma yin na de lta zhog /
translated: This is not even conceivable, so let us leave it aside.

original: byang chub sems kyi rgyal bar yon phul dang // gang dag tshad med chos 'di bzhi po dang // nam mkha'i khams dang sems can khams rnams dag /
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi rgyal bar yon phul dang // gang dag tshad med chos 'di bzhi po dang // nam mkha'i khams dang sems can khams rnams dag /
translated: The realm of space and the realm of sentient beings,

original: ston pa ma gtogs shes par nus pa med //
analyzed: ston pa ma gtogs shes par nus pa med //
translated: Are not known by anyone except the Teacher.

original: gang phyir sems can thams cad rjes bzung phyir //
analyzed: gang phyir sems can thams cad rjes bzung phyir //
translated: Because of this, in order to care for all sentient beings,

original: byang chub sems bskyed gnas pa ji lta bar //
analyzed: byang chub sems bskyed gnas pa ji lta bar //
translated: The generation of bodhicitta is as follows:

original: dbul pos dpag tshad khor yug gcig tsam gyi //
analyzed: dbul pos dpag tshad khor yug gcig tsam gyi //
translated: A poor person finding a treasure the size of a single league

original: gter dag rnyed pa de ltar dga' ma yin //
analyzed: gter dag rnyed pa de ltar dga' ma yin //
translated: Is not as joyful as this.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub phyir ni rgyal ba yi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub phyir ni rgyal ba yi //
translated: For the sake of the Buddha's enlightenment, the Victorious One🔽Demonstrated the eight displays, the ten powers,

original: rnam par rol pa brgyad dang stobs bcu dang // sems can sdud pa lnga brgya dga' mdzad bzhi //
analyzed: rnam par rol pa brgyad dang stobs bcu dang // sems can sdud pa lnga brgya dga' mdzad bzhi //
translated: The five hundred ways of gathering sentient beings, the four delights,🔽The eighty thousand ways of engaging, the eighty-four ways of realization,🔽The sixty thousand unsurpassed gateways,

original: rtogs byed 'jug pa dag ni brgyad khri dang // rtogs par byed pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang // bla na med pa'i sgo mo drug khri dang // sa rnam 'byed dang ye shes bdun cu drug /
analyzed: rtogs byed 'jug pa dag ni brgyad khri dang // rtogs par byed pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang // bla na med pa'i sgo mo drug khri dang // sa rnam 'byed dang ye shes bdun cu drug /
translated: The classification of the levels, and the seventy-six aspects of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas mtshon pa spyod pa bco brgyad dang // pha rol gnon pa lnga dang brtan pa bcu //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mtshon pa spyod pa bco brgyad dang // pha rol gnon pa lnga dang brtan pa bcu //
translated: The eleven strengths, and the four forms of fearlessness,🔽The three closely placed recollections, and great compassion,🔽The ten powers of a tathagata, and the eighteen distinctive qualities,🔽The four forms of intrepid confidence, and the four forms of unhindered knowledge,🔽The six forms of supernormal knowledge, and the seven branches of enlightenment,🔽The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, and the three forms of supreme knowledge,

original: spyod yul ther 'bum phrag ni bcu gcig dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas dag gi yon tan @543a *//
analyzed: spyod yul ther 'bum phrag ni bcu gcig dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas dag gi yon tan @543a *//
translated: The three forms of purity, and the three forms of fearlessness,

original: gang // mchan dang dpe byad dag dang spyod lam dag /
analyzed: gang // mchan dang dpe byad dag dang spyod lam dag /
translated: The three forms of mindfulness, and great compassion,🔽The ten powers of a tathagata, and the four forms of intrepid confidence,🔽The four forms of unhindered knowledge, and the six forms of supernormal knowledge,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma yin na //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma yin na //
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, and the three forms of supreme knowledge,🔽The three forms of purity, and the three forms of mindfulness,

original: nyan thos sgra rjes 'brang ba'i smos ci dgos; ;mtshungs pa med pa 'dra ba yon min pas //
analyzed: nyan thos sgra rjes 'brang ba'i smos ci dgos; ;mtshungs pa med pa 'dra ba yon min pas //
translated: The great compassion, and the eighteen distinctive qualities,🔽The ten powers of a tathagata, and the four forms of intrepid confidence,🔽The four forms of unhindered knowledge, and the six forms of supernormal knowledge,🔽The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, and the three forms of supreme knowledge,

original: des na sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab ces brjod ///
analyzed: des na sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab ces brjod ///
translated: The three forms of purity, and the three forms of mindfulness,🔽The great compassion, and the eighteen distinctive qualities,🔽The ten powers of a tathagata, and the four forms of intrepid confidence,🔽The four forms of unhindered knowledge, and the six forms of supernormal knowledge,🔽The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, and the three forms of supreme knowledge,

original: gang dag byang chub mchog rab sems yod pa //
analyzed: gang dag byang chub mchog rab sems yod pa //
translated: The three forms of purity, and the three forms of mindfulness,🔽The great compassion, and the eighteen distinctive qualities,🔽The ten powers of a tathagata, and the four forms of intrepid confidence,

original: de dang de dag mi dman mtshungs med spyod //
analyzed: de dang de dag mi dman mtshungs med spyod //
translated: The four forms of unhindered knowledge, and the six forms of supernormal knowledge,

original: de dag de ring 'jig rten nor chen rnyed //🔽de dag 'jig rten legs par 'tsho bas 'tsho //
analyzed: de dag de ring 'jig rten nor chen rnyed // de dag 'jig rten legs par 'tsho bas 'tsho //
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, and the three forms of supreme knowledge,

original: bdud rnams bcom ste bdud rtsi reg byas nas //
analyzed: bdud rnams bcom ste bdud rtsi reg byas nas //
translated: The three forms of purity, and the three forms of mindfulness,🔽The great compassion, and the eighteen distinctive qualities,🔽The ten powers of a tathagata, and the four forms of intrepid confidence,🔽The four forms of unhindered knowledge, and the six forms of supernormal knowledge,

original: char sprin lhun stug lta bur tshim par byed //
analyzed: char sprin lhun stug lta bur tshim par byed //
translated: The thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, and the three forms of supreme knowledge,🔽The three

original: gang de byang chub la zhugs 'jig rten skyob //
analyzed: gang de byang chub la zhugs 'jig rten skyob //
translated: They are dedicated to enlightenment and protect the world.

original: de dag nor bdun dag gis sdud par byed //
analyzed: de dag nor bdun dag gis sdud par byed //
translated: They gather beings through the seven riches.

original: gal te sdug bsngal brgya mang bzod byed pa //
analyzed: gal te sdug bsngal brgya mang bzod byed pa //
translated: “If they can endure many hundreds of sufferings,

original: de bas byang chub gang zhugs skyo mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de bas byang chub gang zhugs skyo mi 'gyur //
translated: Why would those dedicated to enlightenment be discouraged?

original: de yis yon tan de dag myur 'thob la //
analyzed: de yis yon tan de dag myur 'thob la //
translated: They will quickly attain those qualities

original: 'jig rten kun gyi mchog ma dag tu'ang 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi mchog ma dag tu'ang 'gyur //
translated: And become the supreme ones in all the worlds.

original: 'dod pa'i rgyu yis sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyu yis sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur //
translated: “For the sake of the objects of desire, they experience many sufferings,

original: gang gi rnam par smin pas ngan 'gror lhung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gi rnam par smin pas ngan 'gror lhung bar 'gyur //
translated: The ripening of which will cause them to fall into the lower realms.

original: mtho ris 'gro dang byang chub yon tan don gyi phyir //
analyzed: mtho ris 'gro dang byang chub yon tan don gyi phyir //
translated: For the sake of the qualities of enlightenment and going to the higher realms,

original: mkhas pa su zhig byis pa dag ltar 'gal bar byed //
analyzed: mkhas pa su zhig byis pa dag ltar 'gal bar byed //
translated: What wise person would act in contradiction, like the childish?

original: byis pa 'gal byed mkhas pa 'gal mi byed //
analyzed: byis pa 'gal byed mkhas pa 'gal mi byed //
translated: “The childish act in contradiction, the wise do not act in contradiction.

original: mi @543b shes 'khrul yin shes ldan dran pa thob //
analyzed: mi @543b shes 'khrul yin shes ldan dran pa thob //
translated: The ignorant are confused; the wise attain mindfulness.

original: blun po 'dam bying mkhas pa thang la gnas //
analyzed: blun po 'dam bying mkhas pa thang la gnas //
translated: The foolish sink in the mud; the wise remain on dry land.

original: gang dag chos spyod pa ni de la bzod //
analyzed: gang dag chos spyod pa ni de la bzod //
translated: “Those who practice the Dharma have patience with that.

original: de bas rigs pa can min spang bya zhing //
analyzed: de bas rigs pa can min spang bya zhing //
translated: Therefore, one should abandon what is unreasonable,

original: gang dag shes yul rigs ldan sten par bya //
analyzed: gang dag shes yul rigs ldan sten par bya //
translated: And the objects of knowledge of those who are endowed with reasoning.

original: dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas kyang //
analyzed: dpal dang grags pa rnyed pa spangs nas kyang //
translated: Abandoning the acquisition of glory and fame,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni rnal 'byor bya //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni rnal 'byor bya //
translated: Practice this samādhi.

original: sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran pa yang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas re re'i yon tan dran pa yang //
translated: Remembering the qualities of each buddha

original: bskal ba khri phrag tshad med bzod byas na //
analyzed: bskal ba khri phrag tshad med bzod byas na //
translated: For countless tens of thousands of eons,

original: sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med smos ci dgos //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yon tan bsam med smos ci dgos //
translated: What need is there to mention the inconceivable qualities of the buddhas?

original: de bas sdug bsngal nyam thag dang du longs //
analyzed: de bas sdug bsngal nyam thag dang du longs //
translated: Therefore, accept the suffering of despair.

original: bzod dang ting 'dzin dag gi go bgos la //
analyzed: bzod dang ting 'dzin dag gi go bgos la //
translated: Wearing the armor of patience and samādhi,

original: brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta zhon //
analyzed: brtson 'grus rgyal mtshan tshul khrims shing rta zhon //
translated: Mount the chariot of diligence and morality,

original: sbyin stobs shes rab mda' yis bdud bcom ste //
analyzed: sbyin stobs shes rab mda' yis bdud bcom ste //
translated: And with the arrow of the power of generosity and insight, defeat the māras.

original: pham byas byang chub dag la reg par gyis //
analyzed: pham byas byang chub dag la reg par gyis //
translated: Having defeated them, reach enlightenment.🔽When you have the friend of love, the spiritual friend of practice,🔽The inseparable perfection of enthusiasm,

original: byams pa'i grogs dang sgrub pa'i bshes gnyen dang // dbyer med pha rol phyin pa spro byad dang // stong pa'i gnas bcas shugs kyi zas bsten tshe //
analyzed: byams pa'i grogs dang sgrub pa'i bshes gnyen dang // dbyer med pha rol phyin pa spro byad dang // stong pa'i gnas bcas shugs kyi zas bsten tshe //
translated: The place of emptiness, and the food of strength,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan thob par gyis //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan thob par gyis //
translated: You will attain the qualities of omniscience.

original: de bas ji skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la //
analyzed: de bas ji skad 'dir gsungs rnam nges la //
translated: Therefore, always apply yourself with care

original: bag dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyong bar gyis //
analyzed: bag dang ldan pas rtag tu sbyong bar gyis //
translated: to the ascertainment taught here.

original: mkha' la ngang pa skad 'byin dga' ba ltar //
analyzed: mkha' la ngang pa skad 'byin dga' ba ltar //
translated: Like swans diving into the lake,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa myur du thog par gyis //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa myur du thog par gyis //
translated: quickly attain omniscience.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: King of Supreme Joy,

original: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na da @544a *//
analyzed: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na da @544a *//
translated: in the past, at a time gone by,

original: bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor ther 'bum rnyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te //
analyzed: bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas zhes bya ba 'khor ther 'bum rnyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te //
translated: there appeared a thus-gone one named Boundless Diligence, together with an assembly of a billion.

original: de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston to //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston to //
translated: He taught this absorption.

original: de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa na de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig byung bas thos nas des btsun mo stong dang sras stong la smras pa //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin 'di ston pa na de'i tshe rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba zhig byung bas thos nas des btsun mo stong dang sras stong la smras pa //
translated: When he taught this absorption, at that time there appeared a king named Puṇyaprabha. Having heard it, he said to his thousand queens and thousand sons:

original: ting nge 'dzin zad par snang ba 'di'i don kyang mi shes so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin zad par snang ba 'di'i don kyang mi shes so //
translated: 'I do not understand the meaning of this absorption called the Appearance of Exhaustion.

original: ma shes pas rtogs par byar yang mi nus so //
analyzed: ma shes pas rtogs par byar yang mi nus so //
translated: Without understanding it, I am unable to realize it.'

original: de lta yin gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa la bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni /
analyzed: de lta yin gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa la bdag cag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni /
translated: “Even so, we rejoice in the Tathāgata’s good teachings.🔽We rejoice in this samādhi, which the Bhagavān has taught and explained.

original: bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs shing bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba byas pas /🔽de dag rjes su yi rang ba'i //
analyzed: bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs shing bshad pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba byas pas / de dag rjes su yi rang ba'i //
translated: Through that rejoicing,

original: mong la skal pa brgyad khrir 'khor ba bsnyil nas de las kha phyir phyogs par gyur to //
analyzed: mong la skal pa brgyad khrir 'khor ba bsnyil nas de las kha phyir phyogs par gyur to //
translated: they reduced their time in saṃsāra by eighty thousand eons and turned away from it.

original: khyim can zhes bya ba'i gzugs kyang thob par gyur to //
analyzed: khyim can zhes bya ba'i gzugs kyang thob par gyur to //
translated: They attained the form of a householder.

original: byang chub ji skad bstan pa la'ang the tshom med par gyur to //
analyzed: byang chub ji skad bstan pa la'ang the tshom med par gyur to //
translated: They had no doubt about the way enlightenment is taught.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba des na /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba des na /
translated: Through that root of merit,

original: sangs rgyas sum 'bum dag mnyes par byas par gyur to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sum 'bum dag mnyes par byas par gyur to //
translated: they pleased three hundred thousand buddhas.

original: thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to //
translated: They attained this samādhi in all their lifetimes.

original: log par ltung ba dang / mi khom dag tu nam @544b yang ltung bar ma gyur to //
analyzed: log par ltung ba dang / mi khom dag tu nam @544b yang ltung bar ma gyur to //
translated: They never fell into the lower existences or into inopportune existences.

original: rgyu de kho nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: rgyu de kho nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
translated: He fully awakened to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood through that cause alone.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: “Supreme Joy King,

original: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya ba de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste /
translated: you should not think that at that time, on that occasion, King Puṇya­kusuma was someone else.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de /
translated: That was the thus-gone Amitāyus.

original: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya bar gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bsod nams me tog ces bya bar gyur to //
translated: At that time, on that occasion, he was King Puṇya­kusuma.

original: bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni /
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni /
translated: Those thus-gone ones of the fortunate eon

original: de'i tshe de'i dus na sras stong du gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i dus na sras stong du gyur to //
translated: at that time, on that occasion, were his one thousand sons.

original: de ltar rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mthu che ba yin na /
analyzed: de ltar rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di mthu che ba yin na /
translated: “If even just rejoicing in this way has such great power,

original: klog pa dang // lung 'bog pa dang / sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: klog pa dang // lung 'bog pa dang / sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: what need is there to mention reading and reciting it, or practicing it?

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: “Supreme Joy King,

original: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba'i khor 'bum snyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te /
analyzed: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya ba'i khor 'bum snyed dang bcas pa zhig byung bar gyur te /
translated: “In the past, there was a thus-gone one called Amṛtānanda, who was accompanied by a retinue of one hundred thousand.

original: de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bas khang bzang gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de la 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bas khang bzang gser gyi 'od dang ldan pa /
translated: A universal monarch called Vipulabuddhi offered him a fine mansion that was radiant with gold,

original: tsandan dmar po'i chus btab pa //
analyzed: tsandan dmar po'i chus btab pa //
translated: sprinkled with red sandalwood water,

original: aa ga ru'i bdugs pas bdugs pa zhig phul lo //
analyzed: aa ga ru'i bdugs pas bdugs pa zhig phul lo //
translated: and perfumed with agarwood incense.

original: longs spyad pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la'ang /
analyzed: longs spyad pa'i phyir dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la'ang /
translated: In order to enjoy it, he also offered to the entire saṅgha of monks

original: de kho na dang 'dra ba zhig phul bar gyur @545a *//
analyzed: de kho na dang 'dra ba zhig phul bar gyur @545a *//
translated: a similar mansion.

original: to; ;de dag thams cad la'ang bskyed mos tshal re re'ang phul bar gyur to //
analyzed: to; ;de dag thams cad la'ang bskyed mos tshal re re'ang phul bar gyur to //
translated: He also offered to each of them a pleasure garden.

original: des bcom ldan 'das de las ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di yang thos so //
analyzed: des bcom ldan 'das de las ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di yang thos so //
translated: He also heard this teaching on absorption from that blessed one.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi rim gro pa mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog shes rab rdzogs zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de la des 'di skad du /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi rim gro pa mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog shes rab rdzogs zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa de la des 'di skad du /
translated: He said to him,

original: 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shes par bya na /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di shes par bya na /
translated: “I will understand this absorption.

original: khyim na gnas pas ni 'di rtogs par dka' yis /
analyzed: khyim na gnas pas ni 'di rtogs par dka' yis /
translated: It is difficult to realize this while living in a household.

original: ci nas kyang bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya ba gor chag go /🔽zhes smras so //
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag gis skra dang kha spu bregs la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya ba gor chag go / zhes smras so //
translated: I will definitely shave my head and face, put on the orange robes, and go forth from home into homelessness.”

original: de nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sras khri dang / btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa dag zhus pa dang /
analyzed: de nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas sras khri dang / btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rab tu byung ste ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rnam pa dag zhus pa dang /
translated: Then, after shaving his head and face and putting on the orange robes, he went forth from home into homelessness. Together with his sons, the eighty-four thousand queens, and all the others, he went forth and requested the aspects of this absorption.

original: bcom ldan 'das des de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas //
translated: The Blessed One, understanding their thoughts,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di zhag bdun gyi bar du rgya cher yang dag par bstan to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di zhag bdun gyi bar du rgya cher yang dag par bstan to //
translated: For seven days he taught this samādhi extensively.

original: de dag gis thos nas kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du /
analyzed: de dag gis thos nas kyang gcig la gcig 'di skad du /
translated: Having heard it, they said to each other,

original: kye ma ting nge 'dzin ni mthong bar dka' mod kyi //
analyzed: kye ma ting nge 'dzin ni mthong bar dka' mod kyi //
translated: ‘Alas! The samādhi is difficult to see,

original: 'on kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di legs par bris te bcang @545b bar bya'o //🔽zhes 'dzer to //
analyzed: 'on kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di legs par bris te bcang @545b bar bya'o // zhes 'dzer to //
translated: but still we should write out this samādhi and keep it.’

original: de dag thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di bris nas kyang mchod pa byas so //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di bris nas kyang mchod pa byas so //
translated: All of them wrote out this samādhi and made offerings to it.

original: bzung ngo // lung yang phog go /
analyzed: bzung ngo // lung yang phog go /
translated: They memorized it and received the transmission.

original: de nas de dag thams cad dus las 'das nas slar de dag tshegs par gyur pas sangs rgyas drug 'bum mnyes par byas par gyur to //
analyzed: de nas de dag thams cad dus las 'das nas slar de dag tshegs par gyur pas sangs rgyas drug 'bum mnyes par byas par gyur to //
translated: Then, after they all passed away, they were reborn again and pleased six hundred thousand buddhas.

original: thams cad du ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur to //
analyzed: thams cad du ting nge 'dzin 'di thos par gyur to //
translated: Everywhere they heard this samādhi.

original: thams cad du rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to //
analyzed: thams cad du rab tu byung nas ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur to //
translated: Everywhere they went forth and attained this samādhi.

original: smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas thams cad kyis byang chub rab tu thob gyur to //
analyzed: smon lam ji ltar btab pa bzhin dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas thams cad kyis byang chub rab tu thob gyur to //
translated: By this very root of merit, may all attain Awakening just as I have prayed!

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: “ Supremely Joyful King,

original: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste //
analyzed: khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs de khyod kyis gzhan yin no snyam pa de ltar blta bar mi bya ste //
translated: you should not think that the universal monarch Vast Mind at that time, on that occasion, was someone else.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de /
translated: That was the Tathāgata Dīpaṃkara.

original: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bar gyur to //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po blo yangs zhes bya bar gyur to //
translated: At that time, on that occasion, he was the universal monarch named Vast Mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni ;dge slong rim gro ba shes rab rdzogs zhes bya bar gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de ni ;dge slong rim gro ba shes rab rdzogs zhes bya bar gyur to //
translated: The Tathāgata Vipaśyin was the monk named Perfect Wisdom who was his attendant.

original: gang dag sras khri po de dag ni /
analyzed: gang dag sras khri po de dag ni /
translated: Those ten thousand princes

original: bskal pa 'di nas gzung ste bskal pa drug cu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskal pa 'di nas gzung ste bskal pa drug cu rtsa lnga'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not attain Awakening until sixty-five eons from now.

original: de'i 'og tu bskal pa grags pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bskal pa grags pa chen po zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: After that, there will be an eon called Great Fame.

original: bskal pa gcig po de la de @546a *//
analyzed: bskal pa gcig po de la de @546a *//
translated: In that very eon

original: dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will fully awaken to supreme and perfect awakening.

original: gang dag blon po brgyad khri po de dag ni /
analyzed: gang dag blon po brgyad khri po de dag ni /
translated: As for those eighty thousand ministers,

original: bskal pa grags pa chen po 'das nas bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskal pa grags pa chen po 'das nas bskal pa brgyad bcu'i bar du 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not fully awaken until eighty eons have passed since the eon of Great Fame.

original: de'i 'og tu bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te //
translated: After that, there will be an eon called Like the Stars,

original: de la blon po brgyad khri po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la blon po brgyad khri po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: in which those eighty thousand ministers will fully awaken to supreme and perfect awakening.

original: bskal pa skar ma lta bu 'das nas bskal pa gsum brgyar sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskal pa skar ma lta bu 'das nas bskal pa gsum brgyar sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After the eon Like the Stars, there will be three hundred eons during which buddhas will appear.

original: de'i 'og tu bskal pa yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bskal pa yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: After that, there will be an eon called Array of Qualities,

original: de la btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: in which those eighty-four thousand queens will fully awaken to supreme and perfect awakening.

original: mchod tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchod tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: The king of great joy,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de ltar 'bras bu che ba yin no //
translated: this bodhisattva samādhi is so greatly fruitful.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: The king of supreme joy,

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa lus dang srog la mi lta bar gyur pas ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa lus dang srog la mi lta bar gyur pas ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal bar bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva should seek this samādhi with a perfect altruistic intention, without regard for body or life.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'od pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rnal @546b 'byor du bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'od pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la rnal @546b 'byor du bya'o //
translated: In order to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, one should practice this samādhi.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Blessed One spoke these verses:

original: sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer ba gang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub don du gnyer ba gang //
translated: Those who strive for the enlightenment of the buddhas

original: de dag rgyal po de yi rjes su slob //
analyzed: de dag rgyal po de yi rjes su slob //
translated: follow that king.

original: yang dag sgrub la gnas pa ma gtogs par //
analyzed: yang dag sgrub la gnas pa ma gtogs par //
translated: Except for those who abide in true practice,

original: gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ni 'thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan gyis byang chub mchog ni 'thob mi 'gyur //
translated: others will not attain supreme enlightenment.

original: de ltar 'di ni dang pa chud bskyed kyang //
analyzed: de ltar 'di ni dang pa chud bskyed kyang //
translated: In this way, even if one’s faith is slight,

original: de bzhin rnam smin gya nom thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin rnam smin gya nom thob par 'gyur //
translated: One will still obtain a sublime fruition.

original: de bas g-yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa yis //
analyzed: de bas g-yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa yis //
translated: Therefore, with an unwavering superior intention,

original: 'dir ni ci rigs bkur stis rnal 'byor gyis //🔽rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir bsgrags pa //
analyzed: 'dir ni ci rigs bkur stis rnal 'byor gyis // rgyal ba gang de bdag gis 'dir bsgrags pa //
translated: Here, the yogi should honor the Victorious Ones with whatever is fitting.🔽Those who wish to see the Victorious Ones,🔽Who wish to explain the teachings extensively,

original: de dag gang zhig mthong bar 'dod pa dang // bstan pa rgya cher 'chad par 'dod pa dang // ji skad bstan bzhin 'di la rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: de dag gang zhig mthong bar 'dod pa dang // bstan pa rgya cher 'chad par 'dod pa dang // ji skad bstan bzhin 'di la rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: And who practice this according to the teachings

original: yi rang nyid kyis phun sum tshogs 'gyur na //
analyzed: yi rang nyid kyis phun sum tshogs 'gyur na //
translated: Will attain perfection through rejoicing.

original: 'chang dang klog pa lta zhig ci smos te //
analyzed: 'chang dang klog pa lta zhig ci smos te //
translated: What need is there to mention those who uphold and read it?

original: yon tan mtha' ni 'gro bas bsam mi nus //
analyzed: yon tan mtha' ni 'gro bas bsam mi nus //
translated: The limits of its qualities cannot be conceived by beings.

original: 'di thos su zhig rnal 'byor sbyor mi byed //
analyzed: 'di thos su zhig rnal 'byor sbyor mi byed //
translated: Who would not apply themselves to the practice upon hearing this?🔽The characteristics of the individual correct knowledges of enlightenment,🔽The teachings, the discussion of others’ minds,

original: byang chub so so yang dag rig mtshan dang // ston dang pha rol sems ni gleng ba dang // sgrub dang snang ba gang dag sangs rgyas chos //
analyzed: byang chub so so yang dag rig mtshan dang // ston dang pha rol sems ni gleng ba dang // sgrub dang snang ba gang dag sangs rgyas chos //
translated: The practices and the appearances that are the qualities of the Buddha

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di las ni btsal bar bya //
translated: Should be sought from this samādhi.

original: las sbyong de bzhin bdud rnams 'joms pa dang // lta sbyong de bzhin sred pa zad byed dang // rnam par rol dang zhing bkod 'byor @547a *//
analyzed: las sbyong de bzhin bdud rnams 'joms pa dang // lta sbyong de bzhin sred pa zad byed dang // rnam par rol dang zhing bkod 'byor @547a *//
translated: The display, and the wealth of the array of fields

original: pa dag / 'di dang rab tu ldan la dkon ma yin //
analyzed: pa dag / 'di dang rab tu ldan la dkon ma yin //
translated: Are not rare for those who possess this.

original: de bzhin rnam grol spobs pa phun tshogs pa //
analyzed: de bzhin rnam grol spobs pa phun tshogs pa //
translated: Likewise, the perfection of eloquence of liberation,🔽The dhāraṇīs that engage in all activities,

original: bya ba thams cad spyod byed gzungs dag dang // bsam pa ji bzhin byang chub 'tshang rgya ba //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad spyod byed gzungs dag dang // bsam pa ji bzhin byang chub 'tshang rgya ba //
translated: And the attainment of enlightenment according to one’s wish

original: de dag thams cad 'dir gnas mod pa yin //
analyzed: de dag thams cad 'dir gnas mod pa yin //
translated: Are all present here.

original: nga yis de snyed tshig gis brjod nus rnams //
analyzed: nga yis de snyed tshig gis brjod nus rnams //
translated: All that I am able to express in words

original: de lta bas na de dag 'dir sgrubs shig //
analyzed: de lta bas na de dag 'dir sgrubs shig //
translated: Should therefore be accomplished here.

original: kun mkhyen chos la dga' bar ma byes na //
analyzed: kun mkhyen chos la dga' bar ma byes na //
translated: If you do not delight in the omniscient Dharma,

original: phyi dus dag na 'gyod par gyur ta re //
analyzed: phyi dus dag na 'gyod par gyur ta re //
translated: You will regret it later.🔽As many perfections as I have taught,

original: pha rol phyin pa ji snyed ngas bstan dang // gang dag ye shes rgya mtsho sbyor lam dag /🔽lus rten byis pa'i spyod la gnas pa yis //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa ji snyed ngas bstan dang // gang dag ye shes rgya mtsho sbyor lam dag / lus rten byis pa'i spyod la gnas pa yis //
translated: And those who are on the path of application to the ocean of wisdom,🔽Are not able to understand

original: shes bar bya ba rab tu nus ma yin //
analyzed: shes bar bya ba rab tu nus ma yin //
translated: What is to be known by one who abides in the conduct of childish beings.

original: dus ngan pa dang sems can ma rungs dang // chos nub mtha' dang ngan song 'phel ba ni //
analyzed: dus ngan pa dang sems can ma rungs dang // chos nub mtha' dang ngan song 'phel ba ni //
translated: the decline of the Dharma, the increase of the lower realms,

original: mkhas pas shin tu yid byung byas zhes kyang //
analyzed: mkhas pas shin tu yid byung byas zhes kyang //
translated: the wise ones are greatly distressed.

original: bag yod ri dvagas bzhin du skrag par 'gyur //
analyzed: bag yod ri dvagas bzhin du skrag par 'gyur //
translated: They are like deer, frightened by carelessness.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
translated: Supremely Joyful One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis bskal pa stong du thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag la spyad pas ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis bskal pa stong du thabs mkhas pa ma gtogs par pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag la spyad pas ni /
translated: the bodhisattva who practices the six perfections for a thousand eons, except through skillful means,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyis phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po @547b snga ma des rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar me 'gro'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyis phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po @547b snga ma des rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du'ang nye bar me 'gro'o //
translated: by the merit of rejoicing upon hearing this samadhi, the previous accumulation of merit in this aggregate will not even approach a hundredth part, up to not even approaching as an example.

original: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
translated: When this Dharma discourse was taught, countless bodhisattvas generated the mind set on unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
translated: All of them became irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i tshogs brgyad 'bum snyed kyang rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
analyzed: lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i tshogs brgyad 'bum snyed kyang rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
translated: The assembly of gods and humans, eight hundred thousand in number, became free of dust and free of defilement, and their Dharma eyes were purified with regard to phenomena.

original: lha de dag chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag me tog gis chal bar bkram par gyur to //
analyzed: lha de dag chos kyi mig rnam par dag pas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag me tog gis chal bar bkram par gyur to //
translated: Because those gods, with their purified Dharma eyes, delighted in the Dharma of the Bhagavān, the great trichiliocosm was strewn with flowers.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug du g-yos so //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug du g-yos so //
translated: This great trichiliocosm shook in six ways.

original: bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga sgra dag bsgrags so //
analyzed: bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga sgra dag bsgrags so //
translated: The sound of a divine drum was heard in the sky.

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba snyed thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba snyed thams cad kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thob bo //
translated: The bodhisattvas, such as Pramuditarāja, all attained this samādhi.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang // @548a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang // @548a *//
translated: Having spoken thus, the Blessed One, together with the bodhisattva mahāsattvas headed by Pramuditarāja,

original: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang // dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang // dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
translated: and the entire world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas, rejoiced in and praised the Blessed One's words.

original: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
analyzed: 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
translated: The noble Mahāyāna sūtra The Good Eon is completed.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidya ka ra singha dang / lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidya ka ra singha dang / lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal gyi dbyangs kyis bsgyur /
translated: Translated by the Indian preceptor Viśvaśānti and the translator-editor Bandé Paltsek.

original: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa /
analyzed: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa /
translated: Revised and finalized by the great editor Bandé Gewé Lodrö.
